Title: Ask Him About Stella
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Tess Leibowitz, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: In Annalise's case to help Laurel, damaging details about a key witness are revealed. The Keating Four continue to work on Annalise's class action lawsuit.
